sentences.english: All information provided will be kept strictly confidential and used for selection purposes only by the adjudication panel.
sentences.chinese: 所有資料將嚴格保密，並只供評選團作甄選之用。

sentences.english: How does a Division get started with the RLI program?
sentences.chinese: 針對第一部分的課程甄選足額的教員。

sentences.english: At the same time, the actual selection of activities will be made by the poor households.
sentences.chinese: 在同一時間，實際甄選活動將所作的貧困戶。

sentences.english: The Artistic Directors of Animato Music Studio will handpick quality tutors and verify their qualifications and experience in person.
sentences.chinese: 本中心藝術總監親自甄選優秀導導及覈實其資歷。

sentences.english: The traditional intellectual selection method is disbelieved by people.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的人才甄選評價方法越來越受到各方面的質疑。
他們是怎樣被甄選出來的？

definition: carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
to win an election/to get a position by passing the imperial exam
to reveal one's talent (idiom)/to rise above others/to distinguish oneself
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to compete/to take part in a competition
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
up to/no less than/as much as
